Description.Text: Collage Cihangir 33 is only 100 meters to the district of Cihangir, known for its cafes each more lively than the other; a favorite meeting point of artists, intellectuals and foreigners living in Istanbul. Its convenient location is within walking distance to the nostalgic tram running along the Istiklal Avenue (Grand Rue de Pera) and to Taksim, the heart of the city as a shopping, commerce and leisure area. The funicular from Taksim can take you down to Kabata? in 2 minutes where you can reach the historical peninsula of Sultanahmet in a very short time by tram to see the ancient monuments, splendid mosques and palaces still standing to reflect the rich historical background of the city. Collage Cihangir 33 Apart which displays the art of collage inspired by the colorful and lively spirit of Istanbul in its special design and decoration has a total of 12 rooms. 6 of them are 20sq.m (215 sq. feet) each consisting of a living room and a bathroom. The other 6 are 35sq.m (376 sq. feet) studio flats with a bedroom, a living room and a bathroom. No pets are allowed. The convenient location and distinctive qualities of Collage Cihangir 33 make it an ideal accommodation place for business travelers and families.
